accounts.name: maker
docs: The user that creates the escrow

accounts.name: mintA
docs: The mint that the maker gives in exchange

accounts.name: mintB
docs: The mint that the maker wants to receive

accounts.name: makerAta
docs: The maker ATA of the `mint_a`

accounts.name: vault
docs: The ATA owned by the escrow program to hold the maker `mint_a` until the exchange completes

accounts.name: escrow
docs: The escrow state account that will be created (PDA derived from seeds and maker pubkey)

accounts.name: systemProgram
docs: The system program for account creation

accounts.name: tokenProgram
docs: The token program for token managing

accounts.name: associatedTokenProgram
docs: The associated token program for ATA creation

accounts.name: taker
docs: The taker that takes the escrow

accounts.name: maker
docs: The maker that created the escrow

accounts.name: mintA
docs: The mint that the taker will get from the maker

accounts.name: mintB
docs: The mint that the taker will give to the maker

accounts.name: takerAtaA
docs: The taker ATA of the mint_a

accounts.name: takerAtaB
docs: The taker ATA of the mint_b

accounts.name: vault
docs: The ATA owned by the escrow program that is holding the `mint_a`

accounts.name: makerAtaB
docs: The maker ATA of the `mint_b` to receive from the taker

accounts.name: escrow
docs: The escrow state account

docs: The system program for account creation

docs: The token program for token managing
